name: Romanian Petroleum Exploration and Production Companies Association
headAddress: Tudor Stefan Street, no. 13, 2nd floor, District 1
goal: The Association aims to strengthen the image of the onshore upstream sector in Romania, and to enhance its relationship and communication with the state, government, regional and local authorities, national agencies, and general public.
euInitiatives:
Petroleum legislation (oil and natural gas)
Energy European market (interconnection)
